name: Linked Colours
description:
Link all the coloured dots together ! 

Linked colours is a puzzle game where you have to connect all the squares of colours together to complete the level. 

But links can't cross each other and some squares have a required number link to have. 

Just click on a square then click on a square whose colour is identical or close to connect the two together. 

An so on, until all the squares are somehow linked together (see third screenshot). 

Mouse over the (i) icon in levels to have instructions.

You better use Chrome instead of Firefox as it loads very slowly on the later.

Made alone in about 22 hours with CraftStudio and a framework of my own for the Ludum Dare 30 Jam.

You can rate the game here : http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-30/?action=preview&uid=14207
